Verses: 1 andha Irandu Thoodharum Saayangaalaththile Sodhomukku Vandhaargal; Loththu Sodhomin Vaasalile Utkaarndhirundhaan. Avargalaik Kandu, Loththu Ezhundhu Edhirkondu Tharaimattum Kunindhu:

2 aandavanmaargale, Adiyenudaiya Veettumugamaai Neengal Thirumbi, Ungal Kaalgalaik Kazhuvi, Raaththangi, Kaalaiyil Ezhundhu Prayaanappattup Pogalaam Endraan. Adharku Avargal: Appadiyalla, Veedhiyile Raaththanguvom Endraargal.

3 avan Avargalai Migavum Varundhik Kettukkondaan; Appozhudhu Avanidaththirkuth Thirumbi, Avan Veettile Pravesiththaargal. Avan Pulippillaa Appangalai Suttu, Avargalukku Virundhupanninaan, Avargal Pusiththaargal.
4 avargal Padukkum Munne, Sodhom Pattanaththu Manidharaagiya Vaalibarmudhal Kizhavarmattumulla Janangal Anaivarum Naanaathisaigalilumirundhu Vandhu, Veettai Soozhndhukondu,
5 loththaik Kooppittu: Indha Raaththiri Unnidaththil Vandha Manushar Enge? Naangal Avargalai Ariyumpadikku Avargalai Engalidaththil Veliye Kondu Vaa Endraargal.
6 appozhudhu Loththu Vaasalukku Veliye Vandhu, Thanakkup Pinnaale Kadhavaip Pootti, Avargalidaththil Poi:
7 sagodharare, Indha Akkiramam Seyyavendaam.

8 idho, Purusharai Ariyaadha Irandu Kumaaraththigal Enakku Undu; Avargalai Ungalidaththirku Veliye Konduvarugiren, Avargalukku Ungal Ishtappadi Seyyungal; Indhappurushar En Kooraiyin Nizhalile Vandhapadiyaal, Ivargalukku Maaththiram Ondrum Seyyavendaam Endraan.

9 adharku Avargal: Appaale Po; Paradhesiyaai Vandha Ivanaa Nyaayam Pesugiradhu? Ippozhudhu Avargalukku Seyvadhaippaarkkilum Unakku Adhiga Pollaappu Seyvom Endru Solli, Loththu Enbavanai Migavum Nerukkik Kadhavai Udaikkak Kittinaargal.
10 appozhudhu Andhap Purushargal Thangal Kaigalai Veliye Neetti, Loththaith Thangal Andaikku Veettukkul Izhuththukkondu, Kadhavaip Pootti,
11 theruvaasalilirundha Siriyorum Periyorumaagiya Manidharukkuk Kuruttaattam Pidikkappanninaargal; Appozhudhu Avargal Vaasalaith Thediththedi Aluththupponaargal.

12 pinbu Andhap Purushar Loththai Nokki: Ivvidaththil Innum Unakku Yaar Irukkiraargal? Marumaganaavadhu, Un Kumaararaavadhu, Un Kumaaraththigalaavadhu, Pattanaththil Unakkuriya Evargalaavadhu Irundhaal, Avargalai Indha Sthalaththilirundhu Veliye Azhaiththukkondu Po.
13 naangal Indha Sthalaththai Azhikkappogirom; Ivargal Kookkural Karththarudaiya Samugaththil Peridhaayirukkiradhu; Idhai Azhikkak Karththar Engalai Anuppinaar Endraargal.

14 appozhudhu Loththu Purappattu, Than Kumaaraththigalai Vivaagampannappogira Than Marumakkalmaarode Pesi: Neengal Ezhundhu Indha Sthalaththai Vittup Purappadungal; Karththar Indhap Pattanaththai Azhikkappogiraar Endraan; Avanudaiya Marumakkalmaarin Paarvaikku Avan Pariyaasampannugiradhaagak Kandadhu.

15 kizhakku Velukkumpodhu Andhath Thoodhar Loththai Nokki: Pattanaththirku Varum Thandanaiyil Nee Azhiyaadhapadikku Ezhundhu, Un Manaiviyaiyum, Inge Irukkira Un Irandu Kumaaraththigalaiyum Azhaiththukkondupo Endru Solli, Avanaith Thuridhappaduththinaargal.

16 avan Thaamadhiththukkondirukkumpodhu, Karththar Avanmel Vaiththa Irakkaththinaale, Andhap Purushar Avan Kaiyaiyum, Avan Manaiviyin Kaiyaiyum, Avan Irandu Kumaaraththigalin Kaiyaiyum Pidiththu, Avanaip Pattanaththirku Veliye Kondupoi Vittaargal.
17 avargalai Veliye Kondupoi Vittapinbu, Avar: Un Jeevan Thappa Odippo, Pinnittup Paaraadhe; Indha Samaboomiyil Engum Nillaadhe; Nee Azhiyaadhapadikku Malaikku Odippo Endraar.
18 adharku Loththu: Appadiyalla Aandavare,

19 umadhu Kangalil Umadhu Adiyenukkuk Kirubai Kidaiththadhe; En Piraananaik Kaakka Dhevareer Enakku Seydha Kirubaiyaip Peridhaaga Vilangappannineer; Malaikku Odippoga Ennaal Mudiyaadhu, Theengu Ennaith Thodarum, Naan Mariththuppoven.
20 adho, Andha Oor Irukkiradhe, Naan Adharku Odippogaththakkadhaai Adhu Kitta Irukkiradhu, Sinnadhumaai Irukkiradhu; En Praanan Pizhaikka Naan Ange Odippogattum, Adhu Sinna Oordhaane Endraan.
21 adharku Avar: Nee Kettukkonda Oorai Naan Kavizhththuppodaadhapadikku, Indha Vishayaththilum Unakku Anukkiragampanninen.
22 theeviramaai Ange Odith Thappiththukkol; Nee Ange Poi Serumattum Naan Ondrum Seyyakkoodaadhu Endraar; Aagaiyaal Andha Oor Sovaar Ennappattadhu.
23 loththu Sovaarukkul Varumpodhu Boomiyinmel Sooriyan Udhiththadhu.
24 appozhudhu Karththar Sodhominmelum Komoraavinmelum, Karththaraale Vaanaththilirundhu Kandhagaththaiyum Akkiniyaiyum Varushikkappanni,
25 andhap Pattanangalaiyum, Andha Samaboomiyanaiththaiyum, Andhap Pattanangalin Ellaak Kudigalaiyum, Boomiyin Payiraiyum Azhiththuppottaar.
26 avan Manaiviyo Pinnittup Paarththu, Uppuththoon Aanaal.
27 vidiyarkaalaththil Aabiragaam Ezhundhu, Thaan Karththarukku Munbaaga Nindra Idaththirkup Poi,
28 sodhom Komoraa Pattanangalin Thisaiyaiyum, Samaboomiyaagiya Dhesam Muzhuvadhaiyum Nokkip Paarththaan; Andha Boomiyin Pugai Soolaiyin Pugaiyaippola Ezhumbitru.

29 dhevan Andha Samaboomiyin Pattanangalai Azhikkumbodhu, Dhevan Aabiragaamai Ninaiththu, Loththu Kudiyirundha Pattanangalaith Thaam Kavizhththuppodugaiyil, Loththai Andha Azhivin Naduvilirundhu Thappippogumpadi Anuppi Vittaar.

30 pinbu Loththu Sovaarile Kudiyirukka Bayandhu, Sovaarai Vittuppoi, Avanum Avanodekooda Avanudaiya Irandu Kumaaraththigalum Malaiyile Vaasampanninaargal; Ange Avanum Avanodekooda Avanudaiya Irandu Kumaaraththigalum Oru Kebiyile Kudiyirundhaargal.
31 appozhudhu Mooththaval Ilaiyavalaip Paarththu: Nammudaiya Thagappan Mudhirvayadhaanaar, Boomiyengum Nadakkira Muraimaiyinpadiye Nammode Sera Boomiyile Oru Purushanum Illai.
32 nammudaiya Thagappanaal Sandhadhi Undaagumpadikku, Avarukku Madhuvaik Kudikkakkoduththu, Avarode Sayanippom Vaa Endraal.

33 appadiye Andru Iravile, Thangal Thagappanukku Madhuvaik Kudikkak Koduththaargal. Mooththaval Poi, Than Thagappanode Sayaniththaal; Aval Sayaniththadhaiyum Ezhundhirundhadhaiyum Avan Unaraadhirundhaan.

34 marunaalile Mooththaval Ilaiyavalaip Paarththu: Netru Raaththiri Naan Thagappanode Sayaniththen; Indru Raaththiriyum Madhuvaik Kudikkak Koduppom, Nammudaiya Thagappanaal Sandhadhi Undaagumpadi Nee Poi Avarode Sayani Endraal.

35 appadiye Andru Raaththiriyilum Thangal Thagappanukku Madhuvaik Kudikkak Koduththaargal. Appozhudhu Ilaiyaval Ezhundhu Poi, Avanode Sayaniththaal; Aval Sayaniththadhaiyum Ezhundhirundhadhaiyum Avan Unaraadhirundhaan.
36 ivvidhamaai Loththin Kumaaraththigal Iruvarum Thangal Thagappanaale Garppavadhiyaanaargal.
37 mooththaval Oru Kumaaranaip Petru, Avanukku Movaap Endru Perittaal; Avan Innaalvaraikkum Irukkira Movaapiyarukkuth Thagappan.
38 ilaiyavalum Oru Kumaaranaip Petru, Avanukkup Pennammi Endru Perittaal; Avan Innaalvaraikkum Irukkira Ammon Puththirarukkuth Thagappan.
